channel.title: Anti-Dragon Fire shield
channel.description: when i put on the anti dragon fire shield and attack run etc. the shield does not move with the character, but other items do like rune defender etc. anyone know how to fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 08:53:44 PM[/size][hr]here's another one of my questions that never get awnsered -.-
